    Reference

    Main Functions

    merge_bem_on_vri()

    Merge BEM attributes on VRI features

    update_bem_from_vri()

    Update BEM attributes based on VRI attributes

    update_bem_from_wetlands()

    Update BEM attributes based on Wetland polygons

    update_beu_from_rule_dt()

    update beu from rules

    create_unique_ecosystem_dt()

    Create summary data of unique ecosystem

    merge_elevation_raster_on_sf()

    Compute slope and aspect from elevation and their mean by polygon

    merge_ccb_on_vri()

    Union merge between CCB attributes and VRI features

    calc_forest_age_class()

    Compute variables for structural stage look up and stand composition look up

    add_std_crown_fields()

    Assign STD_VRI, CROWN_BEAR and CROWN_MOOSE

    merge_unique_ecosystem_fields()

    Assign values from unique ecosystems table

    find_crown_area_dominant_values()

    Find Area-Dominant CROWN_BEAR and CROWN_MOOSE

    create_RRM_ecosystem()

    Create RRM ecosystem information for moose

    create_RRM_ecosystem_moose()

    Create RRM ecosystem information for moose

    create_RRM_ecosystem_bear()

    Create RRM ecosystem information for bear

    merge_rrm_on_vri_moose()

    merge_rrm_on_vri_moose

    merge_rrm_on_vri_bear()

    merge_rrm_on_vri_bear

    Read VRI spatial dataset

    read_wetlands()

    Read Wetlands polygons

    Global Functions
